column1: #Text=Unfortunately, Stephen 'I couldn't care less' Harper doesn't believe this is a matter of a'sociological phenomenon'.
#Text=In his cut-and-dried, right wing world where there are no grey areas, the only thing to do is turn the matter over to the police after the tragedy has occurred.
#Text=The idea of preventing the tragedy doesn't even enter into his mind.
#Text=He's much too busy concentrating on more ways to increase corporate profit margins.
